p: Time-course of cultivation of filamentous fungi was carried out in Erlenmeyer flasks (250 mL) containing 25 mL of selected culture medium, carbon, and nitrogen sources and cultivated for 10 days, at 28Â°C and 180 rpm. At this stage, the samples were collected periodically and biomass and enzyme production were analyzed. Cultures were inoculated individually in each flask using 1 mL conidia suspension (10 7 conidia per mL).
